title: New Player Experience
body:
So i decided to make a new account, and see what the new player Experience is like, and now i see that Riot have just pushed people even further into the "buy RP camp"

From what i can tell, ALL early levels will only unlock specific champions (think Ashe/Garen, as they are level 2/3), haven't got a single drop of blue Essence, haven't got my first win of the day, because it just doesn't exist (stalling this even further)

So good luck getting a champ you want on a new account, because that just isn't possible.

On top of this, as a smurf, you will find that you will get base settings for this smurf (no left click attack move etc.).

Oh yeah, and until level 8, you don't get a choice in runes, you just take the base shit, which might be fine for ACTUAL new players, but it's not fine for smurfs.

So far i'm around 50 minutes on this account, and am just very disappointed in Riot, i will keep playing this account to see just how bad this experience is, but knowing what the Level up system is, it's a terribly implemented system, that actually forces people to fork out money if they really want a champion.
